RelatedSentence: ( KMOX ) - Illinois State Police have joined the probe into the murder of a 43 - year - old Pontoon Beach man who apparently was shot in the head while riding his motorcycle .
( KMOX ) - Illinois State Police have joined the probe into the murder of a 43 - year - old Pontoon Beach man who apparently was shot in the head while riding his motorcycle .
A Madison County Sheriff 's deputy discovered what appeared to be a motorcycle crash around 3:30 a.m. Sunday in a rural area near Granite City .
The deputy found the body of Travis Mayes next to his motorcycle .
A caller to 911 provided information about the shooting .
Illinois State Police Captain James Morrisey said the men know each other , but he could n't give details .
